thread.title: Baby takes over This Morning studio causing CHAOS while Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield insist he’s safe
thread.title_full: Baby takes over This Morning studio causing CHAOS while Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield insist he’s safe

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Baby takes over This Morning studio causing CHAOS while Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield insist he’s safe
text:
Baby takes over This Morning studio causing CHAOS while Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield insist he’s safe The world’s most followed baby charged around the studio Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now 'World's most followed baby' storms This Morning studios Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Harlen Bodhi White might be an internet sensation, but at just 15 months old, he got a bit big for his boots on This Morning . 
The adorable baby sat quietly while his mum Chelsea White told Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield about his life as a blogging superstar. 
But chaos quickly descended when he decided to get up off the sofa and take over the studio. 
"Do you want to get up and have a wander around?" Holly asked. "Bye then, he's off that's showbiz." Harlen Bodhi White looked like butter wouldn't melt (Photo: ITV) Holly Willoughby cooed over the cute baby (Photo: ITV) 
As the segment wound to a close, Harlen finally got a lease of life. 
Holly and Phil could only look on as Harlen charged around running up to cameras. 
“There are a lot of eyes on him right now,” Phil said, reassuring viewers that the baby was safe. Harlen caused chaos when he took over the studio (Photo: ITV) He had a good look at the cameras (Photo: ITV) 
Harlen’s mum is a professional photographer who often posts photos online of her son Harlen and his older sister Harlow, five. 
“I never expected it to take off like it did, now we’ve got these global brands contacting us, they want their things to be seen on Harlen and promoted on his page,” Chelsea said, explaining her son’s meteoric rise to Instagram fame. 
She explained how Harlen’s Instagram page already has a whopping 187k followers. 
Defending her choice to put her children in the limelight, she said: “There’s lots of celebrities and mums that have public profiles posting pictures of their children and thousands of mums apply for their babies to be models.” Like us on Facebook
